input.sentences: the family decided to take a trip to a nearby farm that also allowed pets .
they met a friendly baby sheep that wanted pets .
the sheep 's mom showed up to watch over her baby .
the farm serves fresh pizza made with its own cheese .
it got cold outside | so they stopped by the farm 's indoor cafe for some coffee before heading home .
output.sentences: The pets love to take a trip to the nearby parks.
In the daytime hours the pets mingle with sheep and gazes are met.
As a mom comforts a child, the pets and sheep comefort one another.
At dinner time, pet owners are served fresh pizza.
Oddly the pets are stopped at the door, and the pet owners go inside the home to play golf indoors.
